content.question: Which of the following processes in the nineteenth century most directly created the economic needs filled by Indian indentured servants in the Caribbean?

choices.label: The growth of Great Britainâ€™s textile manufacturing sector as part of the first Industrial Revolution
The shift from East India Company rule to direct British imperial rule in India
The abolition of the trans-Atlantic slave trade and of slavery in British colonies
The success of the Latin American revolutions in establishing independent republics in former Spanish American colonies

content.answer: The abolition of the trans-Atlantic slave trade and of slavery in British colonies
